texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Medical Assistants (MA) must be logged in to the EMR system and other applications prior to contacting patients
texts.text: Medical Assistants (MA) must be logged in to the EMR system and other applications prior to contacting patients

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: MAs always review provider’s daily schedule before starting the day
texts.text: MAs always review provider’s daily schedule before starting the day

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: MAs always introduce themselves to patients as well as where they are calling from (Calm River Health Center, Family Medicine)
texts.text: MAs always introduce themselves to patients as well as where they are calling from (Calm River Health Center, Family Medicine)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: MAs ensure to ask for at least 2 patient verification
texts.text: MAs ensure to ask for at least 2 patient verification

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Patients must always consent to receive links via text for Doxy.me (as they can be charged)
texts.text: Patients must always consent to receive links via text for Doxy.me (as they can be charged)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Patients who do not agree to Doxy.me link will need to be contacted by the provider via regular phone call
texts.text: Patients who do not agree to Doxy.me link will need to be contacted by the provider via regular phone call

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Patients who agree to receiving Doxy.me links, are to receive it while MA is on the phone (MA will wait for patient to join them in Provider’s waiting room to hang up the phone)
texts.text: Patients who agree to receiving Doxy.me links, are to receive it while MA is on the phone (MA will wait for patient to join them in Provider’s waiting room to hang up the phone)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Always ask patients if they require an interpreter
texts.text: Always ask patients if they require an interpreter

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: If patient needs interpreter MA will always introduce the Patient and the interpreter prior to exiting the virtual doxy.me waiting room
texts.text: If patient needs interpreter MA will always introduce the Patient and the interpreter prior to exiting the virtual doxy.me waiting room

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Provider will always move patients and interpreters to the patient room when they are ready to begin the visit
texts.text: Provider will always move patients and interpreters to the patient room when they are ready to begin the visit

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Always ask patients if they would like an Audio only or an Audio and Video telehealth
texts.text: Always ask patients if they would like an Audio only or an Audio and Video telehealth

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Medical Assistants will use EPIC secure chat to communicate with the provider (i.e. patient ready to be seen, audio only visit, video and audio visit, etc.)
texts.text: Medical Assistants will use EPIC secure chat to communicate with the provider (i.e. patient ready to be seen, audio only visit, video and audio visit, etc.)
